title: The noise cancelling earphones and headphones you need to bring you into 2020
text:
Singapore – Gone are the days when the only way you can bring music with you on the go is to be tethered to your device by a wire and a chunky set of headphones on your head. These days, earphones are small and nifty, as tiny as an earplug and connected wirelessly via bluetooth. I bet those who went crazy for the Walkman 30 years ago could not have imagined such great strides the modern world would make in terms of technology.

These days, it’s not just bringing music with us on the go that we rely on earphones for, but for sleep, meditation, workouts, even just to cancel out noise while in the airplane, or to pretend we can’t hear our annoyingly talkative colleague trying to engage with us from the next desk.

With all the products out there in the market, we at Yahoo Lifestyle Singapore are here to help you cancel out the noise from 2019; here are the noise cancelling earphones and headphones you need to bring you into 2020. Now, I’m sure that is music to your ears.
